p: We then reconstructed the joint molecular networks by combining the differential DNA repair pathways for each of the above three comparisons ( Table 1): PC vs FC, PC + FC vs FA, and PC vs FA (Figures 3, 4, and 5, Supplementary file 5). For example, the joined network for the comparison “FC vs PC” included p53 signaling pathway, KEGG Base excision repair pathway, biocarta cell cycle g2 m checkpoint pathway, KEGG Fanconi anemia pathway and ATM pathway with its branches responsible for cell survival ( i) and passing through G2 stage during cell cycle progression ( ii) ( Figure 8).
